  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2462</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The effects of Habitat Fragmentation on microecosystems.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Effekte der Lebensraum-Zerteilung auf 
microecosystems.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les effets de la fragmentation d'habitat sur des 
microecosystems.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os efeitos da fragmentação do habitat em 
microecosystems.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli effetti di frammentazione dell'habitat sui 
microecosystems.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα αποτελέσματα του τεμαχισμού βιότοπων στα 
microecosystems.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los efectos de la fragmentación del habitat en 
microecosystems.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Animation of an experiment to examine the effects of habitat fragmentation on extinction of species liveing in the original ecosystem.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Ecology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ecosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Animation eines Experimentes, zum der Effekte der 
Lebensraumzerteilung auf Löschung der Sorte zu überprüfen, die im 
ursprünglichen Oekosystem liveing ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animation d'une expérience pour examiner les effets de la
fragmentation d'habitat sur l'extinction des espèces liveing dans
l'écosystème initial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animation de uma experiência para examinar os efeitos da 
fragmentação do habitat na extinção da espécie que liveing no 
ecosystem original.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animazione di un esperimento per esaminare gli effetti di 
frammentazione dell'habitat su estinzione della specie che liveing 
nell'ecosistema originale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωτικότητα ενός πειράματος για να εξετάσει τα 
αποτελέσματα του τεμαχισμού βιότοπων στην εξάλειψη των ειδών 
poy στο αρχικό οικοσύστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animación de un experimento para examinar los efectos de 
la fragmentación del habitat en la extinción de la especie liveing 
en el ecosistema original.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ökologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oekosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écosystème</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ecology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ecosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ecologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ecosistema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικολογία</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ecología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ecosistema</string>
          </keyword>
